creature.name: kraken
creature.description: From the depths of the sea rises a Kraken!

creature.name: shark
creature.description: A shark! Best move cautiously.

creature.name: spider
creature.description: You see a spider. It makes a giant spider web to trap you!

creature.name: poisonous spider
creature.description: You see a poisonous spider. Be careful! Its poison is very strong! It will make you very weak and can probably kill you!

creature.name: giant spider
creature.description: You see a giant spider. It has very long legs which are quite dangerous.

creature.name: crab
creature.description: You see a little crab that comes from the beach, be careful of its pincers.

creature.name: chick
creature.description: You see a little chick, it doesn't like to be away from its mother.

creature.name: chicken
creature.description: You see a chicken, isn't it nice?

creature.name: dodo
creature.description: You see a dodo bird, aren't they supposed to be extinct?

creature.name: mother hen
creature.description: You see a mother hen, she will probably hurt you if you touch her sons.

creature.name: penguin
creature.description: You see a penguin, smart and silly.

creature.name: pigeon
creature.description: You see a pigeon, it loves the little seeds.

creature.name: killer bee
creature.description: You see a killer bee which will sting you to death!

creature.name: deer
creature.description: You see a defenseless deer, do not have fear of it.

creature.name: deer
creature.description: You see a reindeer running freely, and wonder if he is one of Santa's special helpers.

creature.name: mouse
creature.description: You see a small mouse that seems to be very hungry.

creature.name: rat
creature.description: You see a small rat that seems to be extremely hungry.

creature.name: bat
creature.description: You see a bat, it will seek your blood, don't be distracted...

creature.name: caverat
creature.description: You see a caverat which is dirty and loves the dungeons.

creature.name: piglet
creature.description: You see a piglet, a bit dirty.

creature.name: babybear
creature.description: You see a babybear, isn't it sweet?

creature.name: beaver
creature.description: You see a beaver. It likes to build dams in the river.

creature.name: big bad wolf
creature.description: You see a big bad wolf. It is really wild, hungry and really dangerous!

creature.name: boar
creature.description: You see a boar, they are pretty wild!

creature.name: bull
creature.description: You see a bull, run away!!!

creature.name: cow
creature.description: You see a cow, taste her delicious milk.

creature.name: fox
creature.description: You see a fox, it becomes extinct!

creature.name: goat
creature.description: You see a goat, which is wild and lives in the mountain.

creature.name: horse
creature.description: You see a horse, don't slap it or it will run away!

creature.name: monkey
creature.description: You see a monkey, would you like to offer it a banana?

creature.name: panda
creature.description: You see a panda which comes from an exotic land.

creature.name: ram
creature.description: You see a ram, maybe you are able to shear it?

creature.name: white horse
creature.description: You see a white horse, they love to stay with their brown friends.

creature.name: wolf
creature.description: You see a wolf. It is wild and very hungry!

creature.name: bear
creature.description: You see a bear. You are lucky and found it awake.

creature.name: lion
creature.description: You see a lion, dangerous and hungry...

creature.name: elephant
creature.description: You see an elephant, a huge animal with lots of ham and meat. Are you sure that you want to attack it?

creature.name: tiger
creature.description: You see a tiger, which likes deer and human meat.

creature.name: venomrat
creature.description: You see a venomrat, extremely poisonous.

creature.name: killer bat
creature.description: You see a killer bat which will suck your blood!

creature.name: black bear
creature.description: You see a strong black bear which hibernates in winter.

creature.name: razorrat
creature.description: You see a razorrat, its noise will make you crazy!

creature.name: giantrat
creature.description: You see a giant rat. It seems like it survived from an experiment which went wrong.

creature.name: unicorn
creature.description: You see a rare unicorn. It is widely believed to be only a myth.

creature.name: centaur
creature.description: You see a noble centaur, half man, half horse. He looks capable of great damage but thankfully seems to mean you no harm.

creature.name: pegasus
creature.description: You see Pegasus, the winged horse. His name means Lightning and he carries bolts of Thunder.

creature.name: caiman
creature.description: You see a caiman, which is hidden in the water.

creature.name: grass snake
creature.description: You see a grass snake which is quite dangerous.

creature.name: snake
creature.description: You see a snake, it came from the forest to poison you!

creature.name: crocodile
creature.description: You see a crocodile, it arises from the deep waters in the rivers.

creature.name: king cobra
creature.description: You see a king cobra. It is extremely venomous.

creature.name: black wolf
creature.description: You see a black wolf, they are wild and very hungry!

creature.name: snow wolf
creature.description: You see a snow wolf, they are wild and very hungry!

creature.name: snow fox
creature.description: You see a snow fox, they are becoming extinct!

creature.name: golden wolf
creature.description: You see a golden wolf, they are wild and very hungry!

creature.name: golden unicorn
creature.description: You see a rare golden unicorn. They are widely believed to be only a myth.
